metadata.description: 50 Test Cases for Compose Day LLM Evaluation

testCases.name: Simple Single Deep Work Task
testCases.description: Single deep work task with no conflicts

testCases.name: Multiple Admin Tasks Bundling
testCases.description: 3 admin tasks should be bundled into one admin block

testCases.name: Calendar Event Conflict Avoidance
testCases.description: Task should not overlap with existing calendar event

testCases.name: Mixed Task Types Separation
testCases.description: Deep work and admin tasks must be in separate blocks

testCases.name: Single Errand Task
testCases.description: Errand task scheduled in appropriate slot

tasks.title: Pick up groceries from Big Bazaar

testCases.name: Meeting Task Recognition
testCases.description: Phone call correctly categorized as meeting

testCases.name: Multiple Calendar Conflicts
testCases.description: Task navigates around multiple calendar events

testCases.name: Duration Range Parsing - Hours
testCases.description: 1-2 hours range should allocate max duration

testCases.name: Duration Range Parsing - Minutes
testCases.description: 30-45 mins range should allocate max duration

testCases.name: High Priority First Scheduling
testCases.description: High priority tasks scheduled before low priority

testCases.name: Energy-Aware Deep Work Morning
testCases.description: Deep work task should be scheduled during high energy morning hours

testCases.name: Admin Tasks in Afternoon
testCases.description: Low cognitive admin tasks scheduled in lower energy afternoon

testCases.name: Working Hours Start Boundary
testCases.description: No tasks scheduled before working hours start

testCases.name: Working Hours End Boundary
testCases.description: No tasks scheduled after working hours end

testCases.name: Break Insertion After Long Block
testCases.description: Break should be inserted after 90 minutes of work

testCases.name: All Four Task Types Together
testCases.description: Schedule with all four task categories handled correctly

testCases.name: Full Day Calendar Blocked
testCases.description: Handle day completely blocked by calendar events

testCases.name: Narrow Time Slot Fitting
testCases.description: Short task fits in narrow gap between events

testCases.name: Task Too Long for Gap
testCases.description: Long task cannot fit in small gap, scheduled elsewhere

testCases.name: No Tasks Edge Case
testCases.description: Empty task list returns empty schedule gracefully

testCases.name: Uncategorized Task Fallback
testCases.description: Task without category gets inferred type based on title

testCases.name: Multiple Errands Bundling
testCases.description: Multiple errands can be grouped into single errand block

testCases.name: Protected Focus Window Compliance
testCases.description: No shallow work scheduled in protected focus windows

testCases.name: Very Long Deep Work Split
testCases.description: 4+ hour deep work may need to be accommodated properly

testCases.name: Timezone America/New_York
testCases.description: Correctly handles US Eastern timezone

testCases.name: Timezone Europe/London
testCases.description: Correctly handles UK timezone

testCases.name: Overlapping Calendar Events
testCases.description: Handle calendar with overlapping events correctly

testCases.name: High Volume - 10 Tasks
testCases.description: Stress test with 10 tasks of mixed types

testCases.name: Task ID Hallucination Check
testCases.description: Verify LLM uses exact task IDs from input

testCases.name: Block Title Descriptiveness
testCases.description: Block title should reference actual task name

testCases.name: Short Duration Precision
testCases.description: 15 minute task should get exactly 15 minutes

testCases.name: Keyword Detection - Call
testCases.description: Call keyword infers meeting type when uncategorized

testCases.name: Keyword Detection - Grocery
testCases.description: Grocery keyword infers errand type when uncategorized

testCases.name: Keyword Detection - Strategy
testCases.description: Strategy keyword infers deep work type when uncategorized

testCases.name: Back-to-Back Deep Work Sessions
testCases.description: Two deep work tasks without break should trigger break insertion

testCases.name: Weekend Day Handling
testCases.description: System handles weekend scheduling correctly

testCases.name: Very Short Working Hours
testCases.description: Handle 4-hour working day correctly

testCases.name: Late Night Working Hours
testCases.description: Handle night owl schedule

testCases.name: Duration Calculation Chain-of-Thought
testCases.description: Verify LLM provides correct duration calculation

testCases.name: External Bundle Constraint
testCases.description: Respect external bundle constraints from orchestrator

testCases.name: Real-World Day - Busy Professional
testCases.description: Complex realistic day for a busy professional

testCases.name: Real-World Day - Remote Worker
testCases.description: Typical remote worker day

testCases.name: Real-World Day - Freelancer
testCases.description: Freelancer with flexible schedule

testCases.name: Conflicting Priorities
testCases.description: Multiple high priority tasks compete for morning slot

testCases.name: Minimum 60-Min Deep Work Rule
testCases.description: Deep work blocks should be at least 60 minutes

testCases.name: All Day Event Handling
testCases.description: Handle all-day calendar events correctly

testCases.name: Interruption Budget Compliance
testCases.description: Respect max daily interruptions setting

testCases.name: Consecutive Same-Type Tasks
testCases.description: Multiple admin tasks can be in one contiguous block

testCases.name: Empty Calendar Many Tasks
testCases.description: Optimize full day with many tasks and no meetings

testCases.name: End-to-End Full Complexity
testCases.description: Ultimate stress test with all features
